chat.title: AI Chat Assistant
chat.error: Failed to send, please try again
chat.confirmClearHistory: Are you sure you want to clear all chat history?
chat.startChatDescription: Send a message to start chatting with AI assistant and experience the charm of intelligent Q&A
chat.askAnything: You can ask any question, and I will do my best to help you
chat.aiDisclaimer: AI assistant may generate inaccurate information, please use the generated content with caution.
chat.inputPlaceholder: Type your message... (Enter to send, Shift+Enter for new line)
chat.sendError: Sorry, an error occurred while sending the message:
chat.responsesApiTooltip: Using OpenAI Responses API for stateful conversations

settings.title: Settings
settings.resetSuccess: Reset successful! Cleared {{count}} provider's dynamic models
settings.resetModelsConfirm: Are you sure you want to reset all model lists to default? This will clear dynamically fetched models.
settings.userManagementDescription: Manage your account information and security settings
settings.pleaseLoginFirst: Please login first to manage user information
settings.selectModelsForChat: Select models to display in chat interface
settings.selectedModelsWillShow: Selected models will be displayed in the chat interface model selector
settings.languageNote: Interface language changes take effect immediately and are saved automatically.
settings.refreshAfterLanguageChange: Please refresh the page after changing language

parameters.title: Parameters
parameters.aiWillDecideLength: AI will intelligently decide output length based on question complexity, no upper limit
parameters.creativityDesc: Control the randomness and innovation level of responses
parameters.outputLengthDesc: When enabled, AI can generate any length as needed; when disabled, set maximum token count
parameters.diversityDesc: Control the diversity of vocabulary selection
parameters.canUseWithTemperature: Can be used together with Temperature
